sourcesContent:
export const homeObjOne = {
  primary: true,
  // lightBg: false,
  lightBg: true,
  lightTopLine: true,
  // lightText: true,
  lightText: false,
  // lightTextDesc: true,
  lightTextDesc: false,
  topLine: "Consulting in Technology and Langauges",
  headline: "Multi-lingual Technology Solutions",
  description:
    "Lakaters offers professional Arabic translation service in India. We translate all sorts of contents ranging from legal, employment , educational and business. Our translators are highly qualified and experienced in Arabic language. Lakaters also offers website designing and development services. We make websites for schools, colleges, hospitals, consultancies, restaurants and all other businesses.",
  buttonLabel: "Get a quote",
  imgStart: "",
  img: require("../../images/svg-6.svg"),
  alt: "Credit Card",
  start: ""
};

export const homeObjTwo = {
  primary: true,
  lightBg: false,
  lightTopLine: true,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: "Website translation",
  headline: "Website in Arabic",
  description:
    "Having a website is a crucial asset for any company. The website is the first thing customers think of when exploring a businesses. However, if your business is in the Middle East, then chances are that the majority of the population will speak only Arabic. We help you to develop an Arabic version for the existing webiste of your business or create a website both in English and Arabic.",
  buttonLabel: "Contact us",
  imgStart: "",
  img: require("../../images/svg-5.svg"),
  alt: "Vault",
  start: ""
};

export const homeObjThree = {
  primary: false,
  // primary: true,
  lightBg: true,
  lightTopLine: false,
  lightText: false,
  lightTextDesc: false,
  topLine: "Translation",
  headline: "Arabic to English Translation ",
  description:
    "Our translators are cerified by internationally recognizsed agencies. we do help you get your immigration docuemtns like Iqama, Passport etc. translated from Arabic to Englihs or vice versa",
  buttonLabel: "Contact us",
  imgStart: "start",
  // img: require("../../images/web-design3.jpg"),
  img: require("../../images/svg-7.svg"),
  alt: "Vault",
  start: "true"
};

export const homeObjFour = {
  primary: true,
  lightBg: false,
  lightTopLine: true,
  lightText: true,
  lightTextDesc: true,
  topLine: "Progressive Web Apps (PWAs)",
  headline: "Get a PWA for your business",
  description:
    "Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) could be the next big thing for modern mobile app development. You are business no longer needs to posted to google play or apple play store. Your customers can directly downlod the app from your website.",
  buttonLabel: "Get a PWA",
  imgStart: "start",
  img: require("../../images/svg-8.svg"),
  alt: "Vault",
  start: "true"
};
